      void sendRedirect(Form form, com.day.cq.wcm.api.Page page, org.apache.sling.api.SlingHttpServletResponse response)

        Issues a 302 redirect with the form serialized into a JSON object that can be read out by the PostRedirectGetFormHelper on the "other side". Allows 302 redirect to target the specified path.
